name: ha-mcp
description: Control and manage Home Assistant with natural language
long_description:
Control and manage your Home Assistant smart home with natural language.
**What you can do:**
- Search and discover entities using fuzzy matching
- Control lights, switches, covers, and climate devices
- Create and manage automations and scripts
- Query history, statistics, and system health
- Organize areas, zones, and device groups
80+ specialized tools give your AI assistant complete access to your smart home.

homeassistant_url.title: Home Assistant URL
homeassistant_url.description: The URL of your Home Assistant instance (e.g., http://homeassistant.local:8123 or https://your-ha.duckdns.org)

homeassistant_token.title: Long-Lived Access Token
homeassistant_token.description: Create a token in Home Assistant: Profile -> Security -> Long-Lived Access Tokens -> Create Token
